data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Targovishte, Bulgaria. Please, stir the 2,182 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Targovishte, Bulgaria

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Targovishte, Bulgaria know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.section_summary: On average, 10 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Targovishte, Bulgaria.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, encourage the church in Targovishte, Bulgaria to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Targovishte, Bulgaria.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Vietnamese people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Targovishte words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 2,182 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Father, bring yourself glory in Targovishte. Through your servants plant 22 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

location.name: Targovishte
location.people_groups_list: Millet, Tatar, Crimean, Arab, Czech, Adyghe
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Millet (88,000), Tatar, Crimean (1,300), Arab (11,000), Czech (9,000), Adyghe (500)
